Class WCAccountBridge

  • Method Details

    • getAccountsFile

      public static File getAccountsFile()
      Gets the accounts file.

      This file is used to store the UUIDs of players and their corresponding MediaWiki accounts. This is used to attribute any edits made by players to their respective accounts.

      Returns:
      The accounts file.
      Since:
      0.1.0

      public static void instantiateAccountFile()

    • requestLink

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String requestLink(UUID uuid, String wikiUsername)
      Requests a link between a player and a MediaWiki account.

      Fails if:

      • The player is already linked to a MediaWiki account.
      • The URL for the player's WikiCraft subpage does not exist.
      • The user's WikiCraft subpage does not contain their UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the player to link.
      wikiUsername - The MediaWiki account to link to.
      Returns:
      • mediawiki_account_already_linked if the MediaWiki account is already linked to a player.
      • uuid_already_linked if the UUID is already linked to a MediaWiki account.
      • user_subpage_not_found if the player's WikiCraft subpage does not exist.
      • user_subpage_creator_mismatch if the player's WikiCraft subpage creator does not match the player's UUID.
      • uuid_not_found if the player's UUID is not found in their WikiCraft subpage.
      • success if the link was successful.
      • add_link_failed if the link could not be added.
      • null if an unknown error occurs.
      Since:
      0.1.0

    • addLink

      public static boolean addLink(UUID uuid, String username)
      Adds a link between a MediaWiki account and a UUID.

      Checks if either the UUID or the MediaWiki username exists in the account bridge before verifying the link.

      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID to link.
      username - The MediaWiki account to link.
      Returns:
      true if the link was added, false otherwise.
      Since:
      0.1.0
